name: Toddler's Farm Animals Puzzle
description:
Toddler's Farm is a simple and happy puzzle game for toddlers and young kids. Puzzle pieces are large, animals are cute, and the app is really easy to use. There are plenty of jigsaw puzzles, animal sounds, and memory games. Toddler's Farm is designed from the ground up for small kids!

"Farm is clearly one of our favorite puzzle apps for young children"
-KinderAppGarten

Features
- Cute farm animals!
- Large puzzle pieces!
- Easy to use!
- Animal sounds!
- Happy music!
- 18 animal puzzles designed for toddlers!
- Memory Games!
- Parental gate to prevent kids from navigating out of the app or making In-App-Purchases accidentally
- Toddler's Farm is free to try and contains two In-App-Purchases!
